description:
Kondou Machahiko was the Karate Club captain. He faces dissolution of his club after all the other members quit due to their losing to Masaru. The lone member who was not defeated, he has to find 5 members to keep the club going. Masaru then lends him a helping hand in his inimitable way.
He is obsessed with being manly.
name: Kondou Machahiko
